alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 10:23PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Benito and central Monterey Counties through 1115 PM PDT... At 1023 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Greenfield, or 21 miles northeast of Arroyo Seco, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Soledad and Gonzales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio
